description.zh: ScribeWizard 是一个基于 Streamlit 的应用，使用 Groq、Whisper 和 Llama3 从音频录音中生成结构化的课堂笔记。它可以转录音频讲座，并逐步整理和生成详细笔记。该应用智能切换 Llama3-8b 和 Llama3-70b 模型，以在速度和质量之间取得最佳平衡。
description.en: ScribeWizard is a Streamlit app that generates organized lecture notes from audio recordings using Groq, Whisper, and Llama3. It transcribes audio lectures and iteratively structures and creates detailed notes. The app intelligently switches between Llama3-8b and Llama3-70b to optimize for both speed and quality.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 高效结合快速与高质量的 Llama3 模型，实现性能优化
- 快速生成结构化且美观的课堂笔记
- 提供云端和本地部署选项，满足不同用户需求

## 功能列表:

- 使用 Whisper-large 转录音频和 Llama3 生成文本，创建结构化笔记
- 借助 Groq 实现音频转录和文本生成的极速处理
- 分层提示策略在 Llama3-70b 和 Llama3-8b 之间智能切换
- Markdown 样式支持生成美观笔记，可包含表格和代码
- 支持将笔记下载为文本或 PDF 文件
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Efficiently combines fast and high-quality Llama3 models for optimal performance
- Enables quick creation of structured and aesthetic lecture notes
- Offers both hosted and local deployment options for user flexibility

## Features:

- Generate structured notes using transcribed audio by Whisper-large and text by Llama3
- Lightning fast speed transcribing audio and generating text using Groq
- Scaffolded prompting strategically switches between Llama3-70b and Llama3-8b
- Markdown styling creates aesthetic notes with tables and code
- Allows user to download notes as text or PDF files
